title: 06/16/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/16/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP shares his biggest issue with the Bucks/Nets game last night. Chris Mannix joins us to discuss the future of Bucks Head Coach Mike Budenholzer if the Bucks fail to advance past this series. Sports Illustrated Executive Editor and Author of "Glory Days" Jon Wertheim joins the show to discuss his book, the USFL, and the one interview he wasn't able to get for the book. And FS1's Nick Wright calls in after attending the Nets/Bucks game last night, with a proposition for Dan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP shares his biggest issue with the Bucks/Nets game last night. Chris Mannix joins us to discuss the future of Bucks Head Coach Mike Budenholzer if the Bucks fail to advance past this series. Sports Illustrated Executive Editor and Author of "Glory Days" Jon Wertheim joins the show to discuss his book, the USFL, and the one interview he wasn't able to get for the book. And FS1's Nick Wright calls in after attending the Nets/Bucks game last night, with a proposition for Dan.
